title: Vulnerable Service
description:
After scanning a target, you find this service:

445/tcp open  microsoft-ds  Windows Server 2008 R2

You suspect this system is vulnerable to a famous SMB exploit used by the WannaCry ransomware in 2017. This exploit targets a vulnerability in SMBv1.

What is the common name of this exploit (NSA codename)?

Submit as: flag{exploit_name} (camelCase as commonly written)
hints: This exploit was leaked by the Shadow Brokers group in 2017
It targets MS17-010 vulnerability in Windows SMB
The name suggests something that lasts forever and is a color
